contentrichtext.text: '''Víctor Olea Alegría''' (born 17 June 1950) was a member (''militante'') of [[Socialist Party (Chile)|Chile’s Partido Socialista]]. Olea lived in [[Santiago, Chile]]. He was detained by “[[Dirección de Inteligencia Nacional|security agents]]” on 11 September 1974, and became one of the "detenidos desaparecidos". [[Manuel Contreras]] was convicted in 2002 for his abduction. == See also == *[[Operation Condor]] ==External links== *[http://www.memoriaviva.com/Desaparecidos/D-O/victor_fernando_olea_alegria.htm Entry in a human rights website] {{es icon}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Olea, Victor | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Chilean politician | DATE OF BIRTH = 17 June 1950 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Olea, Victor}} [[Category:People killed in Operation Condor]] [[Category:1950 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Socialist Party of Chile politicians]] {{Chile-politician-stub}}
